yeah my creator gave me the gift to create and this mind of mine apply to our escape in an atmosphere that wouldnt hold our weight if i leave from here ill call when im safe knocking on the door hoping someone answers yeah i call that faith this mouth of mine has turned down water for wine i still recall that taste of bittersweet like when i realize youll never be as perfect as the one that invented me and the world full of temptations can make you feel so incomplete grow up to better than me go farther than i can go see farther than i can see when my days draw to a close breathe longer than i can breathe and im fine with that in the event that i decide to move forward what youve done they can rewind it back and im a proud parent now as i was a proud parent then i saw you grow up to become the kind of king that i knew youd always been indeed theres a finish line for me but for you theres no end so perhaps all that work thats been done was a win and although my intentions were for good it still brung us to a sin but ill pay for your mistakes as long as this world continues to spin as this vessel of mine breaks down i know you have never been im sure as multi is your home hard times will come again i set aside a book of rhymes thatll pave the way for now and then i know forever is a mighty long time—so where should we begin
